name: Colin
description:
Colin is dressed in a black robe with a skeleton mask. 
He is a CEO for a big company that supplied the university with research software.

failResponses: Sorry I am a little too busy for questions right now.
And why do you think I would help you.
I am not telling you.

name: Diana
description:
Diana is dressed in a fancy white dress with frills. 
She doesn't normally come to these sort of events, she generally considers them to be beneath her.

failResponses: Too busy, go away.
Don't have time for you.
I am not telling you.

name: Lily
description:
Lilly is dressed as an elf from a fantasy game she enjoys playing. 
She's a student who's been working hard all year, 
 she came to the party to get drunk and have fun.

failResponses: Really sorry but I just don't have the time right now.
I'm sure it would be fine if I helped but just don't want to be involved right now.
I am not telling you, sorry.

name: Mary
description:
Mary is dressed in a rather plain tudor style dress. 
She had the idea to have the fancy dress party.

failResponses: Sorry I am far too busy for you
I really don't feel the need to help you.
I am not telling you.

name: Mike
description:
Mike is dressed in a mad scientist outfit with big goofy goggles. 
He helped to organise the fancy dress party.

dialogue.introduction: Hi, have you seen my robot? It seems to have gone astray...
failResponses: Sorry I have some marking to get on with.
I'm not sure why I should help you exactly.
I am not telling you.

name: Will
description:
Will is dressed in an explorers outfit. 
He organised catering team for the party.

failResponses: Sorry I have some graphics to render.
And why would i help you?
I am not telling you.

name: David
description:
David is dressed in an old black school uniform. 
He was invited to attended the party by a friend who couldn't come in the end.

failResponses: Sorry I'm busy at the moment.
I'm not sure whether I should help you or not.
I am not telling you.

name: Julie
description:
Julie is dressed in a steam punk style outfit with pink hair. 
She helped design the decoration's for the party.

failResponses: Sorry I need to help with the decoration at the moment.
Why should I help you then?
I am not telling you.

name: Sophie
description:
Sophie is dressed as a pirate. 
She usually work's as a receptionist and she is very impatiant.

failResponses: Can't you see I'm very busy right now?
I don't want to help!
I am not telling you.

name: Tom
description:
Tom is dressed in brown with an white hair. 
He is teacher at the university who came to the party to escape marking work for a night

dialogue.introduction: Hello do you need help with your work?
failResponses: Sorry I have some emails need to reply right now.
I don't think you really want me to help.
I am not telling you.
